Latex并排显示

##在latex中并排显示代码 


 \begin{columns}[T,onlytextwidth]
    \column{0.33\textwidth}
      Items
      \begin{itemize}
        \item Milk \item Eggs \item Potatos
      \end{itemize}

    \column{0.33\textwidth}
      Enumerations
      \begin{enumerate}
        \item First, \item Second and \item Last.
      \end{enumerate}

    \column{0.33\textwidth}
      Descriptions
      \begin{description}
        \item[PowerPoint] Meeh. \item[Beamer] Yeeeha.
      \end{description}
  \end{columns}
